skills.label: Manage documents and templates
items: Copy custom styles, macros, and building blocks to other documents or templates

skills.label: Prepare documents for review
items: Restrict editing, mark a document as final, protect a document with a password

skills.label: Manage document changes
items: Track changes, manage tracked changes, lock or unlock tracking, add comments, manage comments

skills.label: Perform advanced editing and formatting
items: Find and replace text by using wildcards and special characters, find and replace formatting and styles, set advanced page setup layout options, link text boxes, set paragraph pagination options, resolve style conflicts by using paste options

skills.label: Create styles
items: Create paragraph and character styles, modify existing styles

skills.label: Create and manage indexes
items: Mark index entries, create indexes, update indexes

skills.label: Create and manage references
items: Customize a table of contents, insert and modify captions, create and modify a table of figures

skills.label: Manage forms, fields, and Mail Merge operationss
items: Add custom fields, modify field properties, perform mail merges, manage recipient lists, insert merged fields, preview merge results

skills.label: Create and modify building blocks, macros, and controls
items: Create quick parts, manage building blocks, create and modify simple macros, insert and configure content controls

skills.label: Create custom style sets and templates
items: Create custom color sets, create custom font sets, create custom themes, create custom style sets

skills.label: Prepare a document for internationalization and accessibility
items: Configure language options in documents, add alt text to document elements, manage multiple options for +body and +heading fonts, utilize global content standards
